Plot: When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.
Title: Pulse
Writer: Wes Craven (screenplay), Ray Wright (screenplay), Kiyoshi Kurosawa
Actors: Kristen Bell, Ian Somerhalder, Christina Milian, Rick Gonzalez
tomatoConsensus: Another stale American remake of a successful Japanese horror film, Pulse bypasses the emotional substance of the original and overcompensates with pumped-up visuals and every known horror cliche.
